name: Google Plus - Wide screen - GExtend
description:
Removes white space from Google plus. Stretches content feed to optimally fill space. 
Ported over from the GExtend extension for Google Chrome (http://goo.gl/OwHG6).
additional_info:
Full credit goes to Sebastian Mauer for allowing this to be possible.

Updated for communities! 12/22/12

discussions.name: Needs To Be Updated For Communities
